attributes.action: limit the government benefits to two children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: limit the benefits paid to two children thus taking the incentive of having more children just to increase their benefits.most employed people do not have more children if they feel they cannot afford to but the opposite seems to be the case when on benefits would this be the case if the state was not subsidising the extra children.please note that i do not mean child benefits

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
